com.psddev.dari.db

Class Sorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      • com.psddev.dari.db.Sorter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Recordable, HtmlObject, Cloneable, Comparable<Record>

    @Recordable.Embedded
public class Sorter
extends Record
implements Cloneable
    Sorter used to prioritize items returned from a query.

    Following operators are available:

    • "ascending"
    • "closest"
    • "descending"
    • "farthest"
    • "relevant"

    • Nested Class Summary
